input: Which one of the following statements is correct?

options.A: Rights are claims of the State against the citizens.
options.B: Rights are privileges which are incorporated in the Constitution of a State.
options.C: Rights are claims of the citizens against the State.
options.D: Rights are privileges of a few citizens against the many.

explanation: New NCERT,Std. 11, Political Theory Chapter 5: Rights , Page 72 • Through these rights, people make demands upon the state. So, “C” is most fitting answer.
